body.name: ASHATA I14 Pro Max Unlocked Android Smartphone Celular, 6.1 inch 1440x3040 Mobile Phone Face Recognition, 3G Net Cellphone, 2GB RAM 16GB ROM, 8MP 16MP, 5000mAh, WiFi+BT+FM+GPS
body.stockDetail: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
features: Powerful Functions: 2G 5G dual WIFI can be connected, making your office entertainment easier. Bluetooth 5.0 makes the connection more smooth. With radio station adjustment function, and the chip has the most advanced GPS navigation, so you can travel without worry.

HD Front and Rear Camera: 16MP rear camera and 8MP front camera, you can further edit your photos with filters, emotion or other techniques, and supports multiple shooting modes such as panorama, time, etc. Face unlock phone only takes a second!

5000mAh Capacity Battery: Equipped with a large, above average 5000mAh battery, for Android 8 smartphone lasts longer than you might expect, 10 hours of calls, 14 hours of music, 4 hours of games, and more. Smart and thoughtful AI battery management can reduce excessive cache to save more power, thus extending standby time.

Powerful System and CPU: Equipped with for Android 8 system, MTK6889 10 core CPU and up to 2.0GHz, using a 12nm processor. The architecture runs multiple applications with sufficient mobility and responsiveness to meet your productivity and entertainment needs.

6.1 Inch Screen 1440x3040P: I14 Pro Max phone adopts a 6.1 inch ultra screen, which also has a high definition resolution of 1440x3040. Not only does it bring a wider visual experience, but it also has extraordinary vivid colors and amazing clarity, allowing you to explore every detail to maximize your viewing experience.
body.description: i14 Pro Max 6.1 Inch Cellphone Model: i14 Pro Max Weight: Approx. 400g / 14.1oz Rear Cover: HD Screen, Built in All In One Machine, Nanometer Electroplated, Ceramic Rear Cover (Good Heat Dissipation Effect) Chip: MTK6889 10 Core Network System: GSM 850, 900, 1800, 1900; WCDMA 850, 1900, 2100 Screen Size: 6.1 Inch HD Screen Resolution: 1440x3040P Running Memory (RAM): 2GB Body Memory (ROM): 16GB Function: Face Recognition, with WIFI BT FM, GPS Interface: Type C Charging Interface, 3.5mm Standard Headphone Interface System: for Android 8 Memory Card: Supports a Maximum Expansion of 128GB Dual Card Slot: Supports the Simultaneous Installation of 2 Nano SIM Cards or a Nano SIM Card and a Storage Micro Memory Card) Front Camera: 8MP, f/2.0 Aperture, Fixed Focus Rear Camera: 16MP, Color, f/1.8 Aperture, Auto Focus Applicable Voltage: 100-240V Battery Type: Built in 5000mAh Lithium Battery (Included)
